In Pskov province, he was pardoned by heroes killed in the performance of military duty.Yesterday 22:150
In Pskov province, he was forgiven by heroes who died in the performance of military duties:
• Sergeant GuardsMaxim MARTINOM;
♪ Junior Sergeant(Signed) Arkadiam VISNEVSKI;
♪ Junior SergeantVasilia RYLOVC;
• Juniorsergeant
The doctor warned about the consequences of not having dinner.Yesterday 21:00.0
The complete rejection of dinner could lead to a slowing of metabolism and a deterioration in health, warned an endocrinologist, a neutriciologist, a dietologist, a candidate for medical sciencesOxana PanovaInterview78.ru♪

Dinner is an important component of the diet and participates, on an equal basis with other meals, in the control of exchange.substances
The Regional Commission on the CC approved a plan for anti-explosive activities in 2024Yesterday 8:00.0
The Pskov Region approved a plan for anti-explosive activities in the region in 2024. The regulation on PM prevention during the spring flood has been signed by the Governor of the Region, the Chairman of the PS and Fire Safety CommissionMichael Wedernikov♪

According to the document, responsible implementers will monitor the hydrological situation in the waters of the region and monitor water levels in municipal watersEntities
The court handed down a verdict of a giant who hit a policeman.Yesterday 7:00.0
On 16 November 2023, a man began insulting the transport police, the security forces of the station and the train conductor on the site of the Great Lucky Station. When a police officer demanded to go to the duty station, the giant had already used physical force, hit a police officer and resisted.detentions

CityNikolai KozlovskyAddressed the theme of creating a comfortable urban environment in the Great Lukas.

The comfortable urban environment programme is a key priority project mandated by the President of the Russian FederationFederation Circular

The name of the young giantMaria CuranovaEncyclopedia of Children ' s Achievements

MariaIn the Model Arts Unit, the Theatre of the Children ' s Song of the Light. Her talents are honoured in all Russian and international competitions.

The Grand Prix is the winner of the Pskovska Youth Prize, the winner of the city competition for the award of the M. P. Musorgsky Prize, the first degree winner of the International Festival PrizeTalantine children
In the Great Lukas, the staff of the MES held a lesson for cadets.Yesterday 4:30.0
During the past week, the Cadet School for Schoolchildren held a training course on special protective clothing for fire and rescue personnel.

Chief of Fire and Rescue Caraul No. 6Nikita PantelevI met the guys with a heat-responsive suit for firefighters (TOC 200), designed to protect against elevatedheat specimen
In the great Lukas, a round table was held by the Russian military and historical societyYesterday 4:00.08 photos
On 9 February, a round table was held at the Crevedche Museum of the Great Luke on the occasion of the 80th anniversary of the liberation of Pskov province from German-Fashist invaders and the 100th anniversary of the birth of the hero of the Soviet UnionAlexandra Matrosova♪ The event brought together people who love, appreciate and shore their history.Fathers
Strong freezes will come to the Pskov region tomorrowYesterday, 15:30.0
On 10 February, a variable cloud is expected in the Pskov region. Predominant without precipitation. There's a holoid on the roads. Wind B of 4-9 m/sec. County temperature: 19... 24 degrees, day 6... 11 degrees.

The atmospheric pressure is low.

info.title: In Pskov province, he was pardoned by heroes killed in the performance of military duty.
The doctor warned about the consequences of not having dinner.
info.short_text:
The complete rejection of dinner could lead to a slowing of metabolism and a deterioration in health, warned an endocrinologist, a neutriciologist, a dietologist, an Oxan Panova medical candidate in a conversation with 78.ru.

Dinner is an important component of the diet and participates, on an equal basis with other meals, in the control of the exchange of specimen.

info.title: The Regional Commission on the CC approved a plan for anti-explosive activities in 2024
info.short_text:
The Pskov Region approved a plan for anti-explosive activities in the region in 2024. The regulation on PM prevention during the spring flood has been signed by the Governor of the Region, the Chairman of the CS and Fire Safety Commission, Michael Wedernikov.

According to the document, the responsible implementers will monitor the hydrological situation in the waters of the region and monitor the water levels in municipal water bodies.

info.title: The court handed down a verdict of a giant who hit a policeman.
info.short_text: On 16 November 2023, a man began insulting the transport police, the security forces of the station and the train conductor on the site of the Great Lucky Station. When a police officer demanded to go to the duty station, the giant had already used physical force, hit a police officer and resisted the arrest of the policemen.

info.title: The construction of a family centre began at Luki Park
info.short_text:
The head of the city of Nikolai Kozlovsky addressed the theme of creating a comfortable urban environment in the Great Lucas.

The comfortable urban environment programme is a key priority project mandated by the President of the Russian Federation.

info.title: The Pskov Region ' s residents oversee the work of company managers in the " Services " annex. House
info.short_text: In the Pskov region, the number of users of the mobile Gosudos-Dom application is increasing. More than 10,000 residents of multi-family housing units in the region are regularly approaching the capacity of modern and effective online services to deal with issues related to FCC in one window.

info.title: The name of the young grandchildren has been introduced into the Children ' s Encyclopedia
info.short_text:
The name of the young granddaughter, Maria Curanova, has been introduced to the Encyclopedia of Children ' s Achievements.

Maria is involved in the Model Arts Unit, the Theatre of the Children ' s Rain. Her talents are honoured in all Russian and international competitions.

The Grand Prize is the winner of the Pskovska Youth Prize, the winner of the city competition for the award of the M. P. Musorgsky Prize, the first degree laureate of the International Talent Children Festival Federation

info.title: In the Great Lukas, the staff of the MES held a lesson for cadets.
info.short_text:
During the past week, the Cadet School for Schoolchildren held a training course on special protective clothing for fire and rescue personnel.

Nikita Panteleev, Chief of Fire and Rescue Caraul No. 6, introduced the men with a heat-responsive suit for firefighters (TOC 200), designed to protect against elevated thermal wings

info.title: In the great Lukas, a round table was held by the Russian military and historical society
info.short_text: On 9 February, a round table was held at the Crevedche Museum of the Great Luk, which focused on the 80th anniversary of the liberation of Pskov province from German-Fashist invaders and the 100th anniversary of the birth of the hero of the Soviet Union Alexander Matrosov. The event brought together people who love, appreciate and shore the history of their Father.

info.title: Strong freezes will come to the Pskov region tomorrow
info.short_text:
On 10 February, a variable cloud is expected in the Pskov region. Predominant without precipitation. There's a holoid on the roads. Wind B of 4-9 m/sec. County temperature: 19... 24 degrees, day 6... 11 degrees.

The atmospheric pressure is low.
